directions: Blend vegetable oil, Parmesan cheese, egg substitute, Dijon mustard, garlic, anchovy paste, Worcestershire sauce, and pepper in a blender or food processor until smooth; season with salt.
Drizzle dressing over lettuce in a large mixing bowl; toss to coat. Top salad with croutons.
ingredients: 1/4 cup egg substitute (such as Egg Beaters®)
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
title: Easy Creamy Caesar Salad Dressing
